name: Motley
description:
Dash through a colorful world in this action-puzzle game!

Use your wits and skill to overcome your obstacles on your way to the end of the world!

This game is still in a very early state, everything is subject to change. I'll appreciate any comment, so feel free to say what you think about it!

Currently only the first world is completed, but we are working actively on the next ones.

Thanks for playing :)
